name: Hansonzhe.GitHub.com
body:
##Zhang Wenzhe
Master student  
[School of Software](http://ssdut.dlut.edu.cn/)  
[Dalian University of Technology](http://www.dlut.edu.cn/)  
Dalian, P. R. China, 116621

Birth:	March 16, 1990  
Mobile:	+86 155 0115 1427  
Email:	hansonzhe@gmail.com

###Education
2012-2015	M.S.	School of Software, Dalian University of Technology.  
2008-2012	B.S.	School of Software, Dalian University of Technology.

###Research
- Underwater Acoustic Sensor Networks MAC protocol analysis and design.
- Indoor localization.

###Publications
- UPMAC: A localized load-adaptive MAC protocol for underwater acoustic networks, Wenzhe Zhang, Qin Zhenquan, Xin Jiajun, Wang Lei, Zhu Ming, Sun Liang, Shu Lei.  International Conference on Computer Communication and Networks (ICCCN), 2014. IEEE, 2014, pp 1-8, Shanghai, China.
- INBS: An Improved Naive Bayes Simple learning approach for accurate indoor localization, Wenzhe Zhang, Wang Lei, Zhenquan Qin, Xueshu Zheng, Liang Sun, Jin Naigao, Shu Lei. In Communications (ICC), 2014 IEEE International Conference on, 2014, pp 148-153. IEEE. Sydney, Australia, 2014. 
- Maximizing the Network Lifetime by Using PACO Routing Algorithm in Wireless Sensor Networks. Su Yuhan, Jinxiu Li, Zhenquan Qin, Lei Wang, and Wenzhe Zhang. In Advances in Wireless Sensor Networks, pp.155-165. Springer Berlin Heidelberg, 2014.

### Relative links
- GitHub   https://github.com/hansonzhe
- 博客园   http://home.cnblogs.com/u/hansonzhe/
- CSDN     http://my.csdn.net/my/mycsdn
- 微博     http://weibo.com/u/2050008503/home?wvr=5
